name: The Silmarillion
description:
The First Age..

Play a Maiar in the First Age.. Stay in the Timeless Halls, or venture onto Arda.

a spiritual remake of 1991's War of the Ring game.... 

Sept 12, experimenting with a First Age of Middle Earth clone of 1990s War of the Ring game.. Using a 3rd Age map, at the moment, becasue it's what I've got handy. 

Controls.. 

Arrow Keys to shift Camera Left and Right or Up and Down

Time Controls: Plus, Minus Backspace and Pause buttons

Camera Zoom levels, keys 1, 2, 3, 4, 5, etc..
